column2: where is the nearest Indian restaurant .
column3: now => [ param:geo:Location ] of ( ( sort param:distance:Measure(m) asc of ( compute distance ( param:geo:Location , location:current_location ) of ( ( @org.schema.Restaurant.Restaurant ) filter param:servesCuisine:String =~ " Indian " ) ) ) [ 1 ] ) => notify

column2: search for an Chinese restaurant in LOCATION_0 with at least NUMBER_0 reviews .
column3: now => ( @org.schema.Restaurant.Restaurant ) filter param:aggregateRating.reviewCount:Number >= NUMBER_0 and param:geo:Location == LOCATION_0 and param:servesCuisine:String =~ " Chinese " => notify

column2: what is the rating for the pizzeria uno in LOCATION_0 ?
column3: now => [ param:aggregateRating.ratingValue:Number ] of ( ( @org.schema.Restaurant.Restaurant ) filter param:geo:Location == LOCATION_0 and param:name:String =~ " pizzeria uno " ) => notify

column2: what is the rating of bermuda bar ?
column3: now => [ param:aggregateRating.ratingValue:Number ] of ( ( @org.schema.Restaurant.Restaurant ) filter param:id:Entity(org.schema.Restaurant:Restaurant) == " bermuda bar " ^^org.schema.Restaurant:Restaurant ) => notify

column2: show me the location and name of the nearest Mexican restaurant .
column3: now => [ param:geo:Location ] of ( ( sort param:distance:Measure(m) asc of ( compute distance ( param:geo:Location , location:current_location ) of ( ( @org.schema.Restaurant.Restaurant ) filter param:servesCuisine:String =~ " Mexican " ) ) ) [ 1 ] ) => notify
